channel.title: news on Vinod Kurup
channel.description: Recent content in news on Vinod Kurup

item.title: Dr. Watson
item.description: All I could think of while watching the news about the supercomputer Watson beating humans at Jeopardy was how this could be used in medicine. Looks like I’m not alone. Time to start looking for a new job?

item.title: A sad day for this Wisconsinite
item.description: Russ Feingold lost his U.S. Senate race. I haven’t been following Wisconsin politics since I left 14 years ago, but this makes me sad. The last time that I really cared about the U.S. political landscape was 1992. I was 21 and in college at the University of Wisconsin and was voting for the first time. Bill Clinton was generating excitement, especially on college campuses, but I was more interested in Russ Feingold’s campaign.

item.title: No excuses
item.description: Attention Wisconsin Family Members: Midwest Airlines is restarting direct flights from Milwaukee to Raleigh-Durham. Just FYI :-)

item.title: Almost famous
item.description: Hey, my colleague Steve Vaughan is quoted in this NY Times article on music file sharing and he even got mentioned by name on scripting.com.
